评论详情: I was looking for a wedding guest dress that would allow me to pump easily in . This dress got the job done and was so cute ! The dress wasn't to short and I loved how it tied in the front for easy access for nursing/ pumping. I would definitely recommend to any nursing momma's out there !

I ordered a small and it is true to size. The material is light but not see through. It was perfect was perfect for a formal casual wedding!

I ordered this for a summer wedding. It was very light weight and even though it has sleeves they are very thin and breathable, can see through them. It was a comfy dress but my only two complaints where the sleeves were an odd length where they didn’t reach my wrists all the way and if I reached forward they pulled back and the issue with that was the wrists are tight elastic, not horribly tight but I also have super tiny wrists as it is. I am five foot and and ordered the small. I like the elastic keeps the wrist in place but it could have mayeb bene more comfy or the sleeves mad longer so there was more reach. There is also a cute opening at the midsection but it’s hidden by the huge bow. Do to my build I did have to wear a tank brawl cami under it as other bras would be seen due to the low cut, but depending on others you may not need a bra if as the model picture for it, but there is no padding in the top so if you wanted that some sticky covers would work great! Overall I do love the dress and will wear it again :) love the color, I received lots of compliments.

评论概述: The dress understood the assignment 10 out of 10
评论详情: Size XL I am wearing in the video, but I sent it back to size down so that it can hug me a little tighter. I am 205, 5’6. The dress does stretch around the waist and has plenty room for you to stick to your true size or size down. The color was perfect for the occasion. The fit was flirty and flare. The material is so light on the skin and not sheer so it won’t show your private parts. The cut shows the right amount cleavage and there is no bottom nor zipper, all you do is pull the dress right up and tie it to your liking. This is a dress that goes with my weight loss journey and I can get one in every color. I say buy it!

As the title suggests, this is a perfect little black dress. In my search, I wanted something different and this dress delivered beyond my expectations. I was complimented many times while wearing this dress. The fit was perfect. And for my girls who are a bit heavier up top like myself, the cut and elasticity left nothing to worry about. Most importantly, the material doesn’t leave you sweaty. There was no concern about wrinkles or the thickness of the dress. It’s see through in some places, but not in any places that you’d have to be too worried about. It’s great value for the money and the colors and prints are all beautiful. I’m certain I’ll be ordering others.
